column1: #Text=Zuko says : " Uncle , we have a problem .
#Text=I 've seen that girl in here quite a lot .
#Text=Seems to me she has quite a little crush on you .
#Text=" Jin says : " Thank you for the tea .
#Text=My uncle and I just moved here .
#Text=" Jin says : " Hi Lee , my name 's Jin .
#Text=Thank you and ... well , I was wondering if you would like to go out sometime .
#Text=I 'll meet you in front of the shop at sundown .
#Text=" Zuko says : " It took my uncle ten minutes to do my hair .
#Text=" Jin says : " So , how do you like the city so far ?
#Text=" Jin says : " What do you like to do for fun ?
#Text=Would you and your girlfriend care for dessert ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " She is not my girlfriend !
#Text=" Zuko says : " You have ... quite an appetite for a girl .
#Text=So , Lee , where were you and your uncle living before you came here ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Umm ... well , we 've been traveling around for a long time .
#Text=" Zuko says : " We were ... uh , part of this traveling circus .
#Text=" Jin says : " I 've always wanted to learn how to juggle .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I have n't practiced for a while .
#Text=Hey , I want to show you one of my favorite places in the city .
